author: Draper
description:
A full fledged media player using the PyLav framework.
Help translate the project to your language by contributing to <https://crowdin.com/project/pylav> and <https://crowdin.com/project/pylavcogs>; Translations will be made available as an update shortly after they are translated on Crowdin.
For issues, bugs, or suggestions contact me in the Discord support server here: https://discord.com/invite/Sjh2TSCYQB
end_user_data_statement: This cog will store user info needed for its functions - for example user IDs to remember user specific settings.
install_msg:
Make sure to have read the setup instructions for <https://github.com/Drapersniper/PyLav> (<https://github.com/Drapersniper/PyLav/blob/master/SETUP.md>) to ensure you have set it up correctly before loading any cogs.
Help translate the project to your language by contributing to <https://crowdin.com/project/pylav> and <https://crowdin.com/project/pylavcogs>; Translations will be made available as an update shortly after they are translated on Crowdin.
For issues, bugs, or suggestions contact me in the discord support server here: https://discord.com/invite/Sjh2TSCYQB
name: PyLavPlayer
